text:
Can we get some additional arguments added to the `blog_total_post_count()` <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#blog-total-post-count|function>? It’d be nice to have a tag or author option.

```{{ blog_total_post_count( blog_id, tag_id or author_id) }}```
To make a long story short – it doesn’t seem possible to get the todal post count for tags or author posts

<@U01QVR44MEY> Re #1: is this new? or do neither of us know how to read? :upside_down_face: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields#boolean|The Boolean field type has a "toggle" display setting.>
You know when you spend 3 minutes trying to find a good gif that fits but non of them hit?
